entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/c0/lld7zvgs4x98fk39ht79nhj00000gn/T/tmpks3yoitk/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0048.7482] The filing should include in the cash flow statement calculation linkbase(s) http://fingermotion.com/role/StatementsOfCashFlows one of the following elements as the root(first element) of the calculation tree to represent the aggregate change in cash for the period:
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseIncludingExchangeRateEffect, CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect, NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperations (As long as the element NetCashProvidedByUsedInDiscontinuedOperations is also included the reconciliation between opening and closing cash).
The calculation linkbase in the filing has the following root elements defined: NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActivities.
Rule Element Id: 7482 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2020/elts/us-gaap-2020-01-31.xsd 16060

[DQC.US.0015.1367] us-gaap:InterestExpense has a value of -9,853 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:InterestExpense fact are: Period :2019-03-01 to 2020-02-29 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentsByConsolidatedAndNonconsolidatedEntitiesAxis=us-gaap:VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiaryMember Unit : USD Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1602409/000152013820000312/fngr-20200229.xml 1046

The properties of this us-gaap:InterestExpense fact are: Period :2019-03-07 to 2020-02-29 Dimensions : us-gaap:InvestmentsByConsolidatedAndNonconsolidatedEntitiesAxis=us-gaap:VariableInterestEntityNotPrimaryBeneficiaryMember Unit : USD Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1602409/000152013820000312/fngr-20200229.xml 1048

[DQC.US.0004.9280] Total assets with a value of 2,109,439 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 1,966,067 + 143,362 ) with a value of 2,109,429. [DQC.US.0004.9285] Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest with a value of -2,991,480 is not equal to the combined total of Less: comprehensive income (loss) attributable to non-controlling interest and Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent ( 31 + -2,991,449 ) with a value of -2,991,418.
These values should be equal. entry.message:
[DQC.US.0008.6819] The calculation in the extension taxonomy from ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax to ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation. ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Rule version: 12.0.0 -

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with a value of 31 is represented as a child of us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with a value of -2,991,480 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations. The element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest and the child element us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest.
The properties of this us-gaap:ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest fact are:
Period :2019-03-01 to 2020-02-29 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1602409/000152013820000312/fngr-20200229.xml 1299

property.name: label
property.value: Less: comprehensive income (loss) attributable to non-controlling interest

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet with a value of 10,606 is represented as a child of us-gaap:AssetsCurrent with a value of 4,437,692 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000002 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets. The element us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:AssetsCurrent in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:AssetsCurrent in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:AssetsCurrent and the child element us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.
The properties of this us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet fact are:
Period :2019-02-28 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 12.0.0 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1602409/000152013820000312/fngr-20200229.xml 1133
